role.argrole: attributed to the word person or individual

example.parse: (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تعتقد) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM المصادر)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اسباب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحادث))) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تكون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC شخصية)))))) (PUNC .))
